attributes.action: Change the Law for the murder of any member of our Police Force
attributes.additional_details:
This extends and involves Knife crime all gang members present 
are charged with the murder of a victim of knife crime. 
To be a deterrent to stop and not to carry a knife
Any person found also to be carrying a knife an additional sentence  needs adding on top of any sentence to that of 1 year per inch of a 
knife blade.
In the case of any criminal offence where the criminal is carrying a knife also an additional sentence is added on top of any sentence of 1 year per inch of a knife blade
attributes.background:
Following the horrific Murder of PC Andrew Harper laws need changing to be a deterrent. 
So all criminals involved in any crime resulting in a murder are all charged with the murder 
In the case of the murder of a Police Officer a mandatory sentence of 
Life meaning Life with no parole is needed
